subject: Olympic Games
Ponzi Schemes
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee could lose investments tied to the Wall Street financier accused in a $50 billion financial scam. Richard Carrion, the I.O.C. finance commission chairman, said the I.O.C. has $4.8 million at risk in the alleged Ponzi scheme by Bernard Madoff. The I.O.C. spokeswoman Emmanuelle Moreau said the loss would have “limited impact” on the I.O.C.’s finances.
